title: Bug 132103 - No objects under Context in palette when scripting a data set
OB: No objects are displayed under the 'Context' section in the palette when scripting a data set in the script view.
EB: Objects such as 'this', 'row', and 'reportContext' should be provided under the 'Context' section in the palette when scripting a data set. Other relevant objects should also be available for different methods, as expected.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new data set and select it.
2. Switch to the script view, choose 'onFetch', and open the palette.

Expected result: Objects such as 'this', 'row', and 'reportContext' should be given under the 'Context' section, and other objects should be available for different methods.
